content.raw: @hsu brought up a point that I'll record here: what about underscores in function names, and for that matter, names of structs? The struct names are camel cased right now (`hxRobotInfo`) while the function names are lowercase with no underscores (`hx_robotinfo`). Neither of these conventions are consistent with the scheme for struct member names... I think that function names and member names at least should have the same underscore/capitalization scheme.
content.html: @hsu brought up a point that I'll record here: what about underscores in function names, and for that matter, names of structs? The struct names are camel cased right now (hxRobotInfo) while the function names are lowercase with no underscores (hx_robotinfo). Neither of these conventions are consistent with the scheme for struct member names... I think that function names and member names at least should have the same underscore/capitalization scheme.
